messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CASE NAME: Omega-615 DATE: 12/08/40  Museums across the city have reported thefts of priceless artifacts. These thefts are unique as there's no sign of breaking and entering, leading some to believe it's an inside job.  LAW ENFORCEMENT ENGAGEMENT:  CASE OVERSEER: Captain F. G. Moreno is coordinating multi-museum investigations, collaborating with security heads of each institution. FORENSIC TEAM: Detectives H. I. Walton and J. K. Reid are analyzing security footage and examining the premises of each museum for any overlooked clues. INTELLIGENCE: Detectives L. M. Quinn and N. O. Fernandez are interviewing museum staff, focusing on any recent hires or suspicious activities. PATROL: Patrol Officers P. Q. Gilbert, R. S. Bishop, and T. U. Hanson are intensifying patrolling around museums, especially during the night. LIAISON: Lieutenant V. W. Russo is in touch with international art dealers and galleries, anticipating any attempt to sell the stolen artifacts. ADDITIONAL DETAILS:  One of the stolen artifacts is rumored to have a hidden map to a forgotten treasure, which could be the motive behind the thefts.
